tool_description: Generates formatted purchase orders with all necessary details including terms, conditions, and delivery requirements for supplier procurement.

supplier_id.description: Supplier ID to generate purchase order for

product_ids.description: List of product SKUs to include in the purchase order

quantities.description: Quantity to order for each product (must match product_ids order)

unit_prices.description: Agreed unit price for each product

delivery_location.description: Warehouse or facility code for delivery

priority_level.description: Order priority: standard, urgent, or critical

error_messages: Array length mismatch: product_ids, quantities, and unit_prices must have the same length.
Invalid quantities: All quantities must be positive integers.
Invalid prices: All unit prices must be positive numbers.
Supplier not found: The specified supplier_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid delivery date: delivery_date must be in the future.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [standard, urgent, critical].
usage: Provide supplier information, product details with quantities and prices, delivery requirements, and terms. The tool generates a complete purchase order ready for supplier transmission.

total_order_value.description: Total monetary value of the purchase order

order_status.description: Initial status of the generated purchase order

estimated_delivery_date.description: Estimated delivery date based on supplier lead times
